tableName: Allocation of Quick-Start icons to Nodes/leaves within one product area

attr.name: treeTypNr
attr.description: Product area of the search node

attr.name: qsId
attr.description: Unambiguous number of the quick-start icon (->305)

attr.name: nodeId
attr.description: Unambiguous number of the search node (->301)

attr.name: sortNr
attr.description: Sorting of nodes/leaves within one product area after calling the quick-start icons (separate search tree, may deviate from DT->301)
